description: Hello! My name is DÃªnis Augusto Luft, and I am a front-end developer passionate about technology. I hold a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and am constantly seeking to improve my skills. I have a strong interest in the world of front-end development and enjoy creating attractive and interactive interfaces. My primary tools include HTML, CSS, TypeScript, JavaScript, and React. With these technologies, I am capable of turning ideas and concepts into amazing digital products. I always strive to stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in front-end development because I believe that continuous learning is essential to enhance my skills and deliver high-quality results to the projects I'm involved in. I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to apply my knowledge and creativity to web development solutions. If you are looking for a passionate and dedicated front-end developer, I am ready to collaborate on innovative projects and be part of a talented team. Feel free to explore my portfolio and see some of the projects I have worked on.
fortmix: Landing page developed for FortMix Construction Company. Built with React and TypeScript
report: Report page featuring multiple charts with values that can be modified in a JSON file. Developed with React and JavaScript
raro: Video tutorial platform. Developed with ReactJS and TypeScript
userdata: Table manipulation. Developed with TypeScript and React
git: Page to find GitHub user data by username. Developed with JavaScript
gif: Page using the GIPHY API to search for GIFs. Developed with JavaScript
fini: Product Landing Page created for the Responsive Web Design course by FreeCodeCamp. Developed with HTML and CSS
decaltak: Landing Page developed for Decaltak Visual Communication company. Built with React and TypeScript
name: Name
